title: Blacksmith

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Choose to craft a bulletproof vest at night.
- Choose to give any number of players a bulletproof vest at night. (0 vests)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- A player that you give a bulletproof vest to may choose to don their vest during the night instead of performing their normal night ability. This gives them Basic Defense for that night only.
- If a player dies without using their vest, you will come back into possession of it the following night and may give it out to another player.
- You may craft as many bulletproof vests as you like.
- You may give out as many bulletproof vests are you like in one night, but you may only give out as many vests as you have crafted.
- You may not multitask.
- You may not give yourself a vest.

desc:
Post 708
*Thankfully, unlike my blades, these vests do not suffer from cracks and stress fractures.*
